channel.title: Posts on CodeScorpions
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CodeScorpions

item.title: Sum of Odd and Even Numbers
item.description: number = input("Enter the number ") even_sum = 0 odd_sum = 0 for digit in number: if int(digit)%2 == 0: even_sum += int(digit) else: odd_sum += int(digit) print("Even sum %d" % even_sum) print("Odd sum %d" % odd_sum)

item.title: Python Program to Find Number of Letters in a String
item.description: string1 = input("Enter the string ") d = {} for char in string1: if char not in d: d["char"] = 1 else: d["char"] += 1 print(d)
